get.summary: Gets a list of SAP monitors in the specified subscription.
get.description: Gets a list of SAP monitors in the specified subscription. The operations returns various properties of each SAP monitor.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a list of SAP monitors in the specified resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a SAP monitor for the specified subscription, resource group, and resource name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a SAP monitor with the specified subscription, resource group, and SAP monitor name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.summary: Patches the Tags field of a SAP monitor.
patch.description: Patches the Tags field of a SAP monitor for the specified subscription, resource group, and SAP monitor name.

parameters.description: The Update SAP workload monitor request body.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

SslPreference.description: Gets or sets certificate preference if secure communication is enabled.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation applies to data-plane.

actionType.description: Defines the action type of workload operation.

OperationsDefinitionArrayResponseWithCon.description: Defines the workload operation definition response.

value.description: Defines the workload operation definition response properties.

nextLink.description: The URL to get to the next set of results, if there are any.

details.description: Array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innerError.description: Object containing more specific information than  the current object about the error.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of SAP monitors.

MonitorListResult.description: The response from the List SAP monitors operation.

identity.description: [currently not in use] Managed service identity(user assigned identities)

Monitor.description: SAP monitor info on Azure (ARM properties and SAP monitor properties)

provisioningState.description: State of provisioning of the SAP monitor.

appLocation.description: The SAP monitor resources will be deployed in the SAP monitoring region. The subnet region should be same as the SAP monitoring region.

routingPreference.description: Sets the routing preference of the SAP monitor. By default only RFC1918 traffic is routed to the customer VNET.

zoneRedundancyPreference.description: Sets the preference for zone redundancy on resources created for the SAP monitor. By default resources will be created which do not support zone redundancy.

logAnalyticsWorkspaceArmId.description: The ARM ID of the Log Analytics Workspace that is used for SAP monitoring.

monitorSubnet.description: The subnet which the SAP monitor will be deployed in

msiArmId.description: The ARM ID of the MSI used for SAP monitoring.

storageAccountArmId.description: The ARM ID of the Storage account used for SAP monitoring.

MonitorProperties.description: Describes the properties of a SAP monitor.

UpdateMonitorRequest.description: Defines the request body for updating SAP monitor resource.

tags.description: Gets or sets the Resource tags.

identity.description: [currently not in use] Managed service identity(user assigned identities)

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of provider instances.

ProviderInstanceListResult.description: The response from the List provider instances operation.

identity.description: [currently not in use] Managed service identity(user assigned identities)

ProviderInstance.description: A provider instance associated with SAP monitor.

HanaDbProviderInstanceProperties.description: Gets or sets the provider properties.

hostname.description: Gets or sets the target virtual machine size.

dbName.description: Gets or sets the hana database name.

sqlPort.description: Gets or sets the database sql port.

instanceNumber.description: Gets or sets the database instance number.

dbUsername.description: Gets or sets the database user name.

dbPassword.description: Gets or sets the database password.

dbPasswordUri.description: Gets or sets the key vault URI to secret with the database password.

sslCertificateUri.description: Gets or sets the blob URI to SSL certificate for the DB.

sslHostNameInCertificate.description: Gets or sets the hostname(s) in the SSL certificate.

sapSid.description: Gets or sets the SAP System Identifier.

sapSid.description: Gets or sets the SAP System Identifier

sapHostname.description: Gets or sets the target virtual machine IP Address/FQDN.

sapInstanceNr.description: Gets or sets the instance number of SAP NetWeaver.

sapHostFileEntries.description: Gets or sets the list of HostFile Entries

sapUsername.description: Gets or sets the SAP user name.

sapPasswordUri.description: Gets or sets the key vault URI to secret with the SAP password.

sapClientId.description: Gets or sets the SAP Client ID.

sapPortNumber.description: Gets or sets the SAP HTTP port number.

sslCertificateUri.description: Gets or sets the blob URI to SSL certificate for the SAP system.

prometheusUrl.description: URL of the Node Exporter endpoint

sslCertificateUri.description: Gets or sets the blob URI to SSL certificate for the prometheus node exporter.

dbPassword.description: Gets or sets the db2 database password.

sapSid.description: Gets or sets the SAP System Identifier

sslCertificateUri.description: Gets or sets the blob URI to SSL certificate for the DB2 Database.

sid.description: Gets or sets the cluster sid.

providerType.description: The provider type. For example, the value can be SapHana.

SapLandscapeMonitorMetricThresholds.description: Gets or sets the Threshold Values for Top Metrics Health.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the threshold.

green.description: Gets or sets the threshold value for Green.

yellow.description: Gets or sets the threshold value for Yellow.

red.description: Gets or sets the threshold value for Red.

SapLandscapeMonitorSidMapping.description: Gets or sets the mapping for SID to Environment/Applications.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the grouping.

topSid.description: Gets or sets the list of SID's.

value.description: The list of Sap Landscape Monitor configuration.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of SAP Landscape Monitor Dashboard.

SapLandscapeMonitorListResult.description: The response from the List SAP Landscape Monitor Dashboard operation.

SapLandscapeMonitor.description: configuration associated with SAP Landscape Monitor Dashboard.

SapLandscapeMonitorProperties.description: Gets or sets the properties for Sap Landscape Monitor Dashboard.

provisioningState.description: State of provisioning of the SAP monitor.

grouping.description: Gets or sets the SID groupings by landscape and Environment.

landscape.description: Gets or sets the list of landscape to SID mappings.

sapApplication.description: Gets or sets the list of Sap Applications to SID mappings.

topMetricsThresholds.description: Gets or sets the list Top Metric Thresholds for SAP Landscape Monitor Dashboard
